import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { io } from 'socket.io-client' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' import { Col, Row, Container } from 'react-bootstrap' import Messages from './components/Messages' import AddNewMsg from './components/AddNewMsg' import './App.css'; const socket = io.connect('http://localhost:5000') // I need to put it in context/global veriable function App() { const [tweets, setTweets] = useState([ // { name: "lala", data: "papa" }, // { name: "nana", data: "rara" } ]) socket.on('message', data => { setTweets(prev => [prev, data]) }) const addTweet = (msg) => { setTweets(prev => ([...prev, msg])) } return

Welcome to PinkChat

Group Chat
; } export default App;
